title: fix: dictionary changed size during iteration error

body:
## Title

There are a lot of places where the locals() is being iterated on, but locals might change during debugging.
Some places have been patched, but not all.

## Relevant issues

Relevant PR: https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm/pull/3657

## Type
🐛 Bug Fix

## Changes
Whenever the code is doing `locals_ = locals()` has been changed to `locals_ = locals().copy()`

thanks - maybe this is the fix we needed for that inconsistent logging issue
